51833.「どうやら 女神の紅蓮石は\n 無事 光の河に捧げられたようだな。:
It appears that the Red Goddess Gem has been
safely offered up to the River of Light.

51838.<center>六聖陣は アストルティアに\nあまたいる 英雄 聖者の中から\n:
The Six Saints were born from among the many
heroes and saints in Astoltia, six of whom
were chosen for their excellence.

51839.<center>六聖陣とは 招かれざる魔族どもから\nアストルティアを守る 聖な:
Six Saints is the holy shield that protects
Astoltia from uninvited demons...

51840.<center>魔族どもの暗躍を阻止せんと 彼らは\n従者である聖使者らを率いて:
In order to stop the demons, they led their followers, the holy messengers, to the land of the other world, and in exchange for many
lives, they won the battle.

51841.<center>魔瘴の荒ぶりし時が 巡りくるたび\n新たな六聖陣が生まれ いつ果:
As the time of the demon miasma rages on, new
Six Saints are born, and a holy war that will
never end has been waged...
